title: "Ignored an invalid @Startup method" with Kafka-Streams
body:
### Describe the bug

When starting Quarkus with kafka-streams-extension enabled, the following warnings are printed in the log:

`[WARNING] [io.quarkus.arc.deployment.StartupBuildSteps] Ignored an invalid @Startup method declared on io.quarkus.kafka.streams.runtime.KafkaStreamsProducer: org.apache.kafka.streams.KafkaStreams getKafkaStreams()
[WARNING] [io.quarkus.arc.deployment.StartupBuildSteps] Ignored an invalid @Startup method declared on io.quarkus.kafka.streams.runtime.KafkaStreamsProducer: io.quarkus.kafka.streams.runtime.KafkaStreamsTopologyManager kafkaStreamsTopologyManager()`

### Expected behavior

No warnings should be printed.

### Actual behavior

Warnings are printed.

### How to Reproduce?

1. Create Quickstart-project with kafka-streams-extention
2. `mvnw clean install`
3. See output

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.19045.3570]

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK Runtime Environment Corretto-17.0.9.8.1 (build 17.0.9+8-LTS)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.5.0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.5 (57804ffe001d7215b5e7bcb531cf83df38f93546)

### Additional information

_No response_
